    • CONTACT US

    • https://pi.pe
    • https://github.com/pipe
    • https://twitter.com/pipe_IoT

    If you would like to get in touch, do please drop us a line (contact (at) pi.pe) or if you fancy a chat in the fresh air over tea or coffee, you’re quite likely to run into us at Factory Berlin !

    We also participate at these industry events and Internet standards bodies :

    Tim:

    FOSDEM, Commcon, Kranky Geek, Kamailio World and meetings of the W3C and IETF

    Simon:

    Pirate Summit, TechCrunch Disrupt, IFA, MWC, CES, SXSW and IoT World
